thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Spur Corp Says HY Franchised Restaurant Sales Declined By 3 pct ‍In South Africa​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Spur Corp Says HY Franchised Restaurant Sales Declined By 3 pct ‍In South Africa​
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Spur Corporation Ltd:
* ‍IN SOUTH AFRICA, HY FRANCHISED RESTAURANT SALES DECLINED BY 3.0%​
* ‍IN SOUTH AFRICA, HY FRANCHISED RESTAURANT SALES DECLINED BY 3.0%, WHILE SALES FROM INTERNATIONAL RESTAURANTS INCREASED BY 1.3% IN RAND TERMS
* ‍FRANCHISED RESTAURANT SALES FOR GROUP DECLINED BY 2.6% TO R3.7 BILLION IN SIX MONTHS TO DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍“CANNOT PREDICT IMPACT OF WATER CRISIS IN WESTERN CAPE, WE ARE IMPLEMENTING REMEDIAL STRATEGIES TO LIMIT DAMAGE”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
